title: Alex Goldman from the Reply All Podcast
itunes:title: Alex Goldman from the Reply All Podcast
description:
I am very pleased to bring you a fun discussion with one of my favorite podcast hosts around, Alex Goldman. He has a long history with punk and music in general that I heard him express a few times in his show and I knew that I had to speak to him. We discuss his musical origins, talent shows and DIY culture in general and how that directly applies to his work with Reply All. BUILD YOUR OWN BEAUTIFUL WEBSITE WITH SQUARESPACE. ENTER THE CODE WORDS FOR 10% YOUR ORDER.CREATIVE LIVE IS YOUR SOURCE FOR THE BEST ONLINE COURSES IN EVERYTHING YOU NEED TO MAKE MUSIC. SONGWRITING, ENGINEERING, MIXING AND MASTERING, THEY HAVE IT ALL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
